Review.Contenu: They logged in my BDO account and the runner sold 160 mil in crons off my account and sold a leyton's 99 mil necklace. When I asked where they stored it, they said they needed it for the runs but there was no transaction history. They said they would pay me back after the runs were over. Now when confronted the runner said it was only 500, I showed a screenshot of the 1500 crons and the manager changed it to 1200-1500. Then I said I gave a screenshot of it 2080 crons and the manager was like "I only know what I'm told". Their solution was that I sell the items they got from the run to pay myself back lol.. To pay myself back with the promotional in the package that said "all items are yours". They don't tell you they will empy you out before they pay you back with the gear. The deceptive part is that they will avoid the question "do you use my items to level?" then they will make it seem like it takes 160 mil to level, as if killing monsters costs 160mil silver to repair your gear. Don't trust these runners without having pictures in advance. I've been a vip on my main for 2 years and their eso service is great, but their BDO service is deceptive, aswell as the gall of the worker to tell me to pay myself back with the items dropped.

Review.Titre: I waited half a day for my order
Review.Contenu: I waited half a day for my order, when they told me that it would be completed in 2-3 hours and you know what they said, let’s do it tomorrow or then, now everyone is busy, then why give an estimate for completing the order? and when I requested a refund, they just started trying to persuade me not to do this, I think that this is an act of scammers, you either fulfill the order as indicated or just return my money to me, this is a bad experience, and how can everyone be busy when in d2 almost no one plays... this game is dead, apparently like the service for it...

Review.Titre: Took 48 hours kept getting the run…
Review.Contenu: Took 48 hours kept getting the run around about the runs I ordered

Extremely terrible. Asked for a time quote before placing an order. Order could not be completed in time that was quoted. Would not provide an update unless forced to do so. When asked for a refund, a lesser service was attempted to be substituted for the same amount. I gave up and tried to even accept that offer as to try and accomplish something with this company, but even then there was a problem with the other service they tried to provide. I have used other boosting services, but this one is by far the worst. Use if you dare.

No lootsharing even when promised, will tell others you used the service and what you paid, extremly arrogant when confronted. you can get personal heroic uldir for 32, just haggle with them, probably cheaper. use Armada13 as discountcode.

Current date: 3/3/2023Armada is now accusing me of either posting a fake review or lying about my experience. Hope everyone reading this avoids this "company" like the plague; your response speaks volumes, Armada.Current date: 3/1/2023 Nearly 2 years after this review I got an email saying that the review may be taken down for undisclosed reasons. This action has to be initiated from Armada's end. 2 years later they still want to scrub my experience from the internet lol. Screw you guys, I gave you 3 stars before but this petty nonsense is taking you down two more.Note: Bottom section added upon compensation given for poor serviceBought a power leveling boost for 2 hours. Their website said that their boost starts within 15-30 minutes. 2 hours of waiting later, I decided to reach out on discord and check my order status. They told me that they needed my server and faction to begin but never reached out for that information and never asked for it when I purchased the service. I gave them the missing information, and I was told there was no ETA on when my boost would start, only that it would be "hours". Another 7 hours go by and I'm told they're ready for me and want my login info. Nowhere on their site does it say that they needed this. When I went to buy 2 hours worth of boosting, I assumed that I'd be buying 2 hours of a dungeon-spammer's time to run me through some dungeons. Nope, they don't allow self-pilots under any circumstance. I eventually gave in and sent them my account info under the condition that they stream the boost for me. Good lord was this stream hard to watch. He did not do ZG boosting like any sane person would. He just started questing right where I had left off. He was using the wrong paladin seal, aura, blessing, and clearly did not understand how to play a paladin efficiently.  I honestly felt bad for the guy, no joke. That is until he started using the consumables I had stockpiled in my bags for TBC launch while questing. I watched him for the full 2 hours and he finished with an extra 60% xp into lvl 59Note: After writing this review I was contacted by someone from Armada who apologized about the poor service. I was refunded the money I spent, was told that they'd change their service description on the website, and compensated with a respectable amount of gold due to the booster using my consumables.

Not a good boost service. they can barely do a 15 on time. Try other boost services, I had 2 wait 2 days after I paid to get a boost, and they gave me the wrong one.Not worth it at all.No doubt trust pilot will delete this reviews like they do most of their customers negative reviews.Trust pilot is NOT a legit review sight when they remove reviews they dont like.Stay away from any company trust pilot gives 5 stars toThats ok if you dont like my TRUTHFUL REVIEW< YOURETARDS AT TRUST PILOT WILL DELETE ANY REVIEW THAT IS NOT 4 STARS OR MORE.SO PEOPLE WILL SEE IT BEFORE YOU REPROBATESDELETE AGAIN LIKE THE OTHERS Just doing my job alerting the public trust pilot is NOT LEGIT

Review.Titre: First time, Amazed; 2nd meh; 3rd wt... happened
Review.Contenu: 1st Post - Amazing team, fast, reliable and definite go to teams.2nd Post - Uh not as great as my first run, but still fast team and because they had an issue i got a 50.00 credit.3rd Post - I got a good run on Heroic NYA with boosters, fun stuff.4th Post - ArmadaBoost is a good boosting team, they can be fast, they can be good, but.... They sometimes will book stuff with teams that are "to tired." i.e. Currently on day 3 of ilvl boost because team is to tired to do more then 3 runs a day for M+. I was told it would be done 3 days ago, and here we are waiting again for them to be ready. Armada has several agents i believe and some are just ready to book for the money and not the customer.
Other than the longer than expected wait time for my order to be processed,  it was completed in a timely manner once it was started
After days and after request I got message the I hv to pay additional 44 Euro or order will be canceled. I’m still waiting for the refund. Never again.Update: Issue is meanwhile settled.

Response time and service was mostly great, but I had to ask for a VPN, even though on the advertisement for the service, it said that a VPN would be used and it made me feel like its not a very safe service to use. - They were happy to compensate me for the misunderstanding and have been really good overall.
Bought a leveling package. Took a bit longer than expected but still very satisfied, customer service was great! I will definitely be ordering from them again!

Update: Spoke with customer service and they helped remedy the issue. Will continue to use the service when needed. First order went great. Second took a few days and asking on ETAs for them to start/finish. Last order I paid for the 'skip the que' but after 3 days with no contact I canceled my order. Will be using another service in the future.

They where friendly during the carries and we talked about Russia! The only issue I had was they had told me it only takes about an hour for them to assemble the group but it took over 3 and than they said it would be another 3 hours after. I just did it the next day instead. There must have just been a time zone issue. either way, I loved these guys and will use them again!

ESO gold, for instance, is usually sent within the hour after purchase.  I also ordered a carry through a veteran dungeon that I had trouble finding a group for otherwise and the team was incredibly professional, though also quite friendly.  They actually did my carry a bit earlier than anticipated, which was a pleasant surprise!  Like I said, my biggest concern going in was security- I was very skeptical about the legitimacy of this service, but I am very happy to say that the service is quite secure, reliable, and professional!
